T04sanss12u:1: tad evam araṇye vasan samādhānāya yujyate ||
T04sanss12u:3: sa teṣām eva satvānām arthāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carann avikṣiptacitto bhavati |
T04sanss12u:7: laukikī dhyānôpapattir api tāvad vikṣiptacittasya durlabhā |
T04sanss12u:10: yāvann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddheyam iti ||punar asyām uktaṃ |
T04sanss12u:11: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittôtpādam upādāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvâkārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ
T04sanss12u:13: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nânuvyañjanagrāhī |
T04sanss12u:22: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati |
T04sanss12u:24: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya manêndriyeṇâsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya pāpakāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ |
T04sanss12u:27: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi
T04sanss12u:56: hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān asaṃbhūtān aniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān
T04sanss12u:58: tatra līne manasi muditā bhāvanayôttejanaṃ kuryāt |
T04sanss12u:61: bahu kalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣi |
T04sanss12u:62: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyajati pramādaṃ yadi moktukāma |
T04sanss12u:65: mayôpamaṃ vitatham etat svapnôpamaṃ ca saṃskṛtam avekṣya na cirād bhaviṣyati viyogaḥ sarvapriyaiḥ
T04sanss12u:67: udyujya yathā ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu |
T04sanss12u:68: mā jātu sraṃsaya vīryaṃ yāvan na budhyathā pravarabodhim |
T04sanss12u:71: jvalitaṃ tribhuvaṃ jaravyādhidukhair maraṇâgnipradīptam anātham idam |
T04sanss12u:72: bhavaniḥśaraṇe sada mūḍha jagad bhramati bhramaro yathā kumbhagataḥ ||
T04sanss12u:74: adhruvaṃ tribhuvaṃ śaradabhranibhaṃ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi janmacyutiḥ |
T04sanss12u:75: girinadyasamaṃ laghuśīghrajavaṃ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe || bhuvi devapure triapāyapathe bhavatṛṣṇâvidyavaśā janatā |
T04sanss12u:76: parivarttiṣu pañcagatiṣv abudhā yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakra bhramī ||
T04sanss12u:78: pariṣiktam idaṃ kalipāśa jagat mṛgalubdhakapāśi yathâiva kapi ||
T04sanss12u:79: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśokôpadrava kāmaguṇāḥ |
T04sanss12u:82: bhavatṛṣṇalatāya vivṛddhikarāḥ sabhayāḥ saraṇā sada kāmaguṇāḥ ||
T04sanss12u:83: yathâgnikhadāḥ jvalitāḥ sabhayāḥ tatha kāmême viditâryajanaiḥ |
T04sanss12u:85: yatha sarpaśiro yatha mīḍhaghaṭaḥ tatha kāmême viditā viduṣām |
T04sanss12u:86: tatha śūlasāmā dvijapeśisamā yatha śvānakaraṃ kiśavaira
T04sanss12u:92: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priyêṣṭamato iya bālacārī |
T04sanss12u:95: parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narêva śūnyaṭavīm ||
T04sanss12u:96: yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo narudānarataḥ tatha prītikaraḥ |
T04sanss12u:100: jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhato va yathā bhavati |
T04sanss12u:101: jarajīrṇâgāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune ||
T04sanss12u:102: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṃ yatha mālulatā ghana śālavanam |
T04sanss12u:103: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo ||
T04sanss12u:104: jara rūpa surūpavirūpakarī jara tejaharī balasthāmaharī |
T04sanss12u:105: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jarâujaharī ||
T04sanss12u:106: bahurogaśatair ghanavyādhidukhaiḥ upasṛṣṭu jagaj jvalanêva mṛgāḥ |
T04sanss12u:107: jara vyādhigataṃ prasamīkṣya jagat dukhaniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu deśaya hī ||
T04sanss12u:109: śiśirehi yathā himadhātu mahaṃ tṛṇagulmavanâuṣadhi ojaharo |
T04sanss12u:112: pratighātakaraḥ priyadveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūryu nabhe ||
T04sanss12u:113: maraṇaṃ cyavanaṃ cyuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā |
T04sanss12u:115: maraṇaṃ vaśitān avaśīkurute maraṇaṃ harate nadi dāru yathā |
T04sanss12u:117: maraṇaṃ grasate bahu prāṇiśatān makaro va jalâkari bhūtagaṇān |
T04sanss12u:118: garuḍo uragaṃ mṛgarāja gaja jvalano va tṛṇâuṣadhibhūtagaṇam |
T04sanss12u:121: tad yathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaś catvāraḥ parvatâgaccheyur dṛḍhāḥ |
T04sanss12u:124: pṛthivīṃ côllikhantaḥ sarvatṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśâdi sarvasatvaprāṇibhūtāni nirmathnantas tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ
T04sanss12u:126: evam eva mahārāja catvārîmāni mahābhayāny āgacchanti yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ
T04sanss12u:136: tad yathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇam anupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti |
T04sanss12u:137: sa ca mṛgo 'tibalaṃ vyāḍamukham āsādya vivaśo bhavati |
T04sanss12u:138: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenâpagatamadasyâparāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu māṃsaśoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe paritaptatṛṣitavihvalavadanasya karacaraṇavikṣepâbhiyuktasyâkarmaṇyasyâsamarthasya lālāsiṅghāṇakapūyamūtrapurīṣôpaliptasya īṣajjīvitâvaśeṣasya karmabhavāt punar bhavam ālambānasya yamapuruṣabhayabhītasya kālarātrivaśagatasya caramâśvāsapraśvāseṣûparudhyamāneṣu e
T04sanss12u:139: kākino 'dvitīyasyâsahāyasyêmaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokam ākrāmato mahāpathaṃ vrajato mahākāntāraṃ praviśato mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya mahândhakāraṃ
T04sanss12u:141: karmavāyunâhriyamāṇasyânimittīkṛtāṃ diśaṃ gacchato nânyat trāṇaṃ nânyac charaṇaṃ nânyat parāyaṇam ṛte dharmāt |
T04sanss12u:142: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavati
T04sanss12u:154: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenâpagatamadasyâtrāṇasyâśaraṇasyâparāyaṇasya nânyat trāṇaṃ nânyat parāyaṇam anyatra dharmāt |
T04sanss12u:155: tasmāt tarhi te mahārājânityatânudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ kṣayavyayânudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ maraṇabhayabhītena
T04sanss12u:156: dharmeṇâiva te mahārāja rājyaṃ kārayitavyaṃ nâdharmeṇa |
T04sanss12u:159: asyâpi te mahārājâtmabhāvasyâivaṃ suciram api parirakṣitasya suciram api śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyâsvādanīyena saṃtarpitasya saṃpravāritasya |
T04sanss12u:161: evaṃ kāśikauśeyadūkūlapattrôrṇākṣaumâdibhir vastraviśeṣair ācchāditasya caramaśayanâvasthitasya vividhasvedâmbuklinnamalinavasanâvṛtasya kālakriyā
T04sanss12u:163: evam api te mahārāja snānânulepanavāsadhūpapuṣpasurabhigandhasyâtmabhāvasya na cireṇa durgandhatā bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss12u:164: evaṃ stry-āgāramadhyagatasyâpi te strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvādyagītatūryanādyair upagīyamānasya sumanasaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato maraṇabhayabhītasyâtīva duṣkhadaurmanasyābhyāṃ kālakriyā bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss12u:165: evam api te mahārāja gṛheṣûpalepanôpalipteṣu susthāpitârgaleṣu supihitavātâyaneṣu bahugandhadhūpapuṣpatailavartiprajvāliteṣv
T04sanss12u:169: punaś ca śṛgālakākagṛdhramṛtakaḍevaramāṃsâsthikeśarudhiravaśâkule paramabībhatse śmaśāne gataceṣṭasyâtmabhāvaḥ pṛthivyām avaśaḥ śeṣyate |
T04sanss12u:170: evam api te mahārāja gajaskandhâśvapṛṣṭharathâbhirūḍhasya śaṅkhapaṭaheṣv āhanyamāneṣu chatreṇa dhāryamāṇena bālavyajanena vījaya-
T04sanss12u:173: nirgamanam anubhūya na cirān niśceṣṭasya mṛtaśayanâbhirūḍhasya caturbhiḥ puruṣair utkṣiptasya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa nirṇītasya mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginībhāryāputraduhitṛvayasyadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaiḥ śokagatahṛdayair vikṣiptakeśair utkṣiptabhujaiḥ sôrastāḍaṃ paramakaruṇaṃ |
T04sanss12u:174: hā putra hā nātha hā tāta hā svāminn ity ākrandamānaiḥ paurajānapadaiḥ saparibhāvadṛśyamānasya śmaśānaṃ nītasya punaḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālâdibhir bhakṣitasya tāny asthīny agninā vā dagdhāni pṛthivyāṃ vā nikhā-
T04sanss12u:176: nitāni adbhir vā klinnāni vātâtāpavarṣair vā cūrṇīkṛtāni digvidikṣu prakṣiptāni tatrâiva pūtabhavam āyāsyanti |
T04sanss12u:178: tatra kleśāḥ prādhānyena rāgadveṣamohā yasyâiṣām ekatarasya tāvat pratipakṣam ādau bhāvayet tannidānaṃ ca varjayet ||
T04sanss12u:187: yad uta santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvak māṃsâsthi snāyuḥ śirā vṛkkā hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ |
T04sanss12u:189: audaryakaṃ yakṛt purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleśmā pūyaṃ śoṇitaṃ mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgaṃ*prasrāvaḥ |
T04sanss12u:192: yo 'pi tāvat syād bālo mūḍhaḥ abhavyo 'kuśalaḥ so 'pi tāvad etāni vastūni
T04sanss12u:198: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāra-
T04sanss12u:200: mitāyāṃ carann imam evaṃ kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T04sanss12u:201: tad yathâpi nāma subhūte goghātako vā goghātakântevāsī vā gāṃ hatvā tīkṣṇena śastreṇa catvāri phalakāni kṛtvā pratyavekṣate sthito 'thavā
T04sanss12u:203: evam eva subhūte bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyaṃ dhātuśo yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T04sanss12u:204: asty asmin kāye pṛthivīdhātur abdhātur api tejodhātur api vāyudhātur apîti
T04sanss12u:207: tad yathâpi subhūte karṣakasya mūtoḍī pūrṇā nānādhānyānāṃ śālīnāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ mudrānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ yavānāṃ godhūmānāṃ maśūrāṇāṃ sarṣapāṇāṃ |tān etān cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ evaṃjātīyād ayaṃ śālir ayaṃ vrīhir amī tilâmī taṇḍulâmī mudrâmī māṣā yavâmī godhūmâmī maśūrâmī sarṣapêti ||
T04sanss12u:208: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyam ūrddhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakanakharomatvak romaparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyâśucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā yāvan mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgam akṣigūthaṃ karṇagūtham iti
T04sanss12u:210: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvaḥ śmaśānagataḥ paśyati nānārūpāṇi mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne 'paviddhāni śavaśayane ujjhitāni ekâhamṛtāni vā dvyahamṛtāni vā tryahamṛtāni vā caturahamṛtāni vā pa-
T04sanss12u:212: ñcâhamṛtāni vā vyādhmātakāni vinīlakāni vipūyakāni vipaṭhyakāni |
T04sanss12u:216: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bahirdhā kāye kāyânudarśī viharati
T04sanss12u:218: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni paśyati |
T04sanss12u:219: ṣaḍrātramṛtāni kākair vā khādyamānāni kurarair vā gṛdhrair vā śvabhir vā śṛgālair vā tato 'nyair vā nānāvidhaiḥ prāṇakajātaiḥ khādyamānāni
T04sanss12u:224: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni vikhāditāny aśucīni durgandhāni |
T04sanss12u:227: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalikāṃ māṃsaśoṇitamrakṣitāṃ snāyuvinibaddhāṃ |sa tatrêmam eva kāyam iti pūrvavat ||
T04sanss12u:228: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalībhūtāni apagatamāṃsaśoṇitasnāyubandhanāni
T04sanss12u:230: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīni digvidikṣu kṣiptāni |
T04sanss12u:241: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīny anekavārṣikāṇi vātânupariśoṣitāni śaṅkhasannibhāni
T04sanss12u:243: ayam api kāyâivaṃdharmâivaṃsvabhāvâitāṃ dharmatāṃ na vyativṛttae iti ||
T04sanss12u:244: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīny anekavārṣikāṇi tirobhūtāni nīlāni kapotavarṇāni pūtīni cūrṇakajātāni pṛthivyāṃ pāṃsunâsamasamībhūtāni sêmam eva kāyaṃ tatrôpasaṃharati ayam api kāyâivaṃdharmâivaṃsvabhāvaḥ |
T04sanss12u:249: tena vā saha bhojanâdyekârthatayâprītyutpādanaṃ tatra parasukhasyâśaṃsā prārthanā tṛṣṇâbhinandanaṃ maitrī |
T04sanss12u:256: anārambaṇā maitrī anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhānāṃ bodhisatvānām iti ||punar buddhârambaṇā bodhisatvârambaṇā śrāvakapratyekabuddhârambaṇā
T04sanss12u:258: tatra satvârambaṇāyāḥ pūrvaṃ priye satve hitasukhôpasaṃhārān na dhyānam abhyasya |
T04sanss12u:266: evaṃ yāvad ekāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvôpasaṃpadya viharati |
T04sanss12u:268: buddhâdyārambaṇāyās tv ayaṃ prayāso nâsti ||sā ca vajradhvajapariṇāmanāyām uktā |
T04sanss12u:269: sa bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ caran yāvanti kānicid dṛśyante rūpāṇi manojñāni vā pratikūlāni vā |
T04sanss12u:270: evaṃ śabdā gandhā rasā spraṣṭavyā dharmā manojñā vā pratikūlā vā |
T04sanss12u:271: anavadyā viśuddhāḥ kalyāṇôdāraprabhāsvarā vā yena saumanasyaṃ jāyate |
T04sanss12u:283: sarvabuddhānām etayā pariṇāmanayā bhūyasyā mātrayā te buddhā bhagavanto 'cintyena buddhavihārasukhena samanvāgatā bhavantv atulyena buddhasamādhisukhena susaṃgṛhītā bhavantv anantasukhena bhūyasyā
T04sanss12u:297: yad idam aparipūrṇānām abhiprāyāṇāṃ paripūrṇāya pariṇamayati |
T04sanss12u:307: sâivaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisatvānām arthāya pariṇamayya buddhaśāsanâvacareṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu tatkuśalamūlam evaṃ pariṇāmayati |
T04sanss12u:308: te kecit satvâikâcchaṭâsaṃhātamātram api buddhaśabdaṃ sṛṇvati |
T04sanss12u:309: dharmaśabdaṃ vâryasaṃghaparyupāsanaṃ vā kurvanti teṣāṃ tatkuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati buddhânusmṛtiparipūryai pariṇāmayati |
T04sanss12u:319: śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu ca tathā bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatveṣu tatkuśala-
T04sanss12u:337: pravartanakarmêryāpathâdhiṣṭhānam īryāpathasyâvikopanaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma sacuritaṃ ṣaṇṇām indriyāṇāṃ saṃvaraḥ svaśarīrâchādanamardanasnānakarma |
T04sanss12u:340: sarvam etad bodhisatvasya sarvajñatâlambanaprayuktasya na kiñcid apariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ sarvasatvahitasukhacittasya ||
T04sanss12u:346: pe ||antaśaḥ śvasv api tad anyeṣv api tiryagyonigateṣv ekâudanônmiñjitam
T04sanss12u:348: sugatāv upapattiṣu tat sarvaṃ teṣām eva hitāya teṣām eva parimocanāya pariṇāmayati |
T04sanss12u:349: tasyās tiryagyones tasmād duṣkhârṇavāt tasmād duṣkhôpādānāt tasmād duṣkhaskandhāt tasmād duṣkhāvedanāyāḥ
T04sanss12u:352: rāt tasmād duṣkhanidānāt tato duṣkhamūlāt tasmād duṣkhâyatanāt teṣāṃ satvānāṃ vinivartanāya pariṇāmayati tadārambaṇena ca sarvasatvârambaṇīkaroti manasikaroti |
T04sanss12u:362: imāś ca suvarṇabhāsôktā maitrīkaruṇāgarbhā gāthāḥ sarvâdarataḥ
T04sanss12u:366: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā śāmyantu sarvavyasanāni loke |
T04sanss12u:367: bhavantu satvā hy abhayâhatā tathā yathâbhayāḥ śāntabhayāḥ munîndrāḥ ||
T04sanss12u:369: tathâiva bhontū guṇasāgarāḥ prajāḥ samādhibodhyaṅgaguṇair upetāḥ ||
T04sanss12u:370: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā bhavantu brahmasvara sarvasatvāḥ |
T04sanss12u:373: tiṣṭhantu kalpāni acintiyāni deśentu dharmaṃ jagato hitāya |
T04sanss12u:374: hanantu kleśān vidhamantu duṣkhān samentu rāgaṃ tatha doṣa moham ||
T04sanss12u:376: śṛṇvantu te dundubhisaṃpravāditaṃ namo 'stu buddhāya bhaṇantu vācam ||
T04sanss12u:377: jātismarāḥ satvā bhavantu sarve jātīśataṃ jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ |
T04sanss12u:378: anusmarantū satataṃ munîndrān śṛṇvantu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hy udāraṃ ||
T04sanss12u:379: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā |
T04sanss12u:380: vivarjayantū khalu pāpakarma carantu kuśalāni śubhakriyāṇi ||sarvatra
T04sanss12u:381: kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca duṣkhāḥ praśamantu loke |
T04sanss12u:382: ye satva vikalêndriyâṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi sakalêndriya bhontu sāṃpratam ||
T04sanss12u:383: ye vyādhitā durbalakṣīṇagātrā nistrāṇabhūtāḥ śayitā diśāsu |
T04sanss12u:384: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cârogya balêndriyāṇi ||
T04sanss12u:385: ye rājacaurabhaṭa tarjita vadhyaprāptā nānāvidhair bhayaśatair
T04sanss12u:389: rvi satva vyasanâgataduṣkhitā hi mucyantu tair bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ ||
T04sanss12u:391: ye tāḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu ca saṃsthitāhi |
T04sanss12u:394: vadhyāś ca saṃyujyiṣu jīvitena vyasanâgatā nirbhaya bhontu sarve ||ye
T04sanss12u:396: andhāś ca paśyantu vicitrarūpāṃ badhirāś ca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān ||nagnāś ca vastrāṇi labhantu citrāṃ daridrasatvāś ca nidhiṃ labhantu |
T04sanss12u:397: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnaiḥ sarve ca satvāḥ sukhino bhavantu ||mā
T04sanss12u:398: kasyacid bhāvatu duṣkhavedanāḥ saukhyânvitāḥ satva bhavantu sarve |
T04sanss12u:399: abhirūpaprāsādikasaumyarūpâneka sukha saṃcita nitya bhontu ||manasânnapānāḥ susamṛddhapuṇyāḥ saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣāṃ |
T04sanss12u:400: vīṇā mṛdaṅgāḥ paṇavāḥ sughoṣakāḥ utsā sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ ||
T04sanss12u:401: suvarṇapadmôtpalapadminīś ca saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣām |
T04sanss12u:402: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca vāsaś ca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ vicitram ||triṣkālavṛkṣebhi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te satva bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ |
T04sanss12u:403: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām ||
T04sanss12u:405: sa bodhisatvān atha śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmasya bodhi pratisṛṣṭi tasya |
T04sanss12u:406: nīcāṃ gatiṃ satva vivarjayantu bhavantu aṣṭâkṣaṇavītivṛttāḥ ||
T04sanss12u:407: āsādayantū jinarājam uttamaṃ labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā |
T04sanss12u:408: sarvā striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāś ca vīrā vidupaṇḍitāś ca ||te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pāramitāsu ṣaṭsu |
T04sanss12u:409: paśyantu buddhān daśasū diśāsu ratnadrumêndreṣu sukhôpaviṣṭān |
T04sanss12u:421: yad idam avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti |
T04sanss12u:422: avidyā cen nâbhaviṣyan nâiva saṃskārāḥ prājñāsyanta |
T04sanss12u:423: evaṃ yāvad yadi jātir nâbhaviṣyan na jarāmaraṇaṃ prājñāsyata |
T04sanss12u:424: atha satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati |
T04sanss12u:425: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati |
T04sanss12u:433: ahaṃ jātyā nirvṛttêti |atha ca satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ
T04sanss12u:434: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ ||
T04sanss12u:439: yad idaṃ pṛthivy-aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyād ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayôpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ ||tatrâdhyātmikasya
T04sanss12u:441: yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate
T04sanss12u:443: yaḥ kāyasyânuparigrahaṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti ayam ucyate 'bdhātuḥ |
T04sanss12u:444: yaḥ kāyasyâśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayam ucyate tejodhātuḥ |
T04sanss12u:448: yaḥ kāyasyântaḥsauṣiryabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate ākāśadhātuḥ |
T04sanss12u:449: yo nāmarūpam abhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ sâsravaṃ ca manovijñānam ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ ||
T04sanss12u:451: yadâdhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur avikalo bhavaty evam aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaś câvikalā bhavanti |
T04sanss12u:467: atha ca satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyôtpattir bhavati |
T04sanss12u:468: tatra pṛthivīdhātur nâtmā na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ |
T04sanss12u:472: evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na câhaṃ na mama na câpy anyasya kasyacit ||tatrâvidyā katamā |
T04sanss12u:473: yâiṣv eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣv ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñâtmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā |
T04sanss12u:478: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante |
T04sanss12u:479: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārêti |
T04sanss12u:482: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni côpādāyôpādāya r ūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tan nāmarūpaṃ |
T04sanss12u:498: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā |
T04sanss12u:505: puṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss12u:506: apuṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss12u:507: āniñjyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss12u:512: ṣaḍbhyâyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśêty ucyate |
T04sanss12u:513: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate |
T04sanss12u:519: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti |
T04sanss12u:522: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā |
T04sanss12u:524: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate |
T04sanss12u:525: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati |
T04sanss12u:537: atha cêmāny asya dvādaśâṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante |
T04sanss12u:548: asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyâbhinirvṛttir na bhavati ||tatra karmaṇo nâivaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss12u:553: vijñānabījasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavaty aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janitêti |
T04sanss12u:560: sa ca nāmarūpâṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nôbhayakṛto nêśvarâdinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na câikakāraṇâdhīno nâpy ahetusamutpannaḥ |
T04sanss12u:561: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādânupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpâṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati |
T04sanss12u:562: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt ||
T04sanss12u:563: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate |
T04sanss12u:565: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ câlokaṃ câkāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca
T04sanss12u:573: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss12u:588: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyôtpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ |
T04sanss12u:590: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati |
T04sanss12u:598: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrôtpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau
T04sanss12u:600: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt ||
T04sanss12u:601: tan nâdhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ ||
T04sanss12u:607: na tu yae eva māraṇântikāḥ skandhās tae evâupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā |
T04sanss12u:608: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānâupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti |
T04sanss12u:611: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nâpy aniruddheṣu |
T04sanss12u:612: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante 'upapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti |
T04sanss12u:616: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante |
T04sanss12u:627: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputrêmaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham anāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam avyupaśamam asvabhāvaṃ paśyati |
T04sanss12u:628: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmanaś ca samanupaśyati
T04sanss12u:630: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nâbhūvam atīte 'dhvani |
T04sanss12u:633: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvani |
T04sanss12u:636: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ |
T04sanss12u:657: hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvâsya saṃyogasyâsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo |
